description: Try our easy to follow Mango Floats recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango Floats Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Put coconut water mixture in a small saucepan. Stir over medium-high heat until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer for 10 minutes or until mixture thickens. Set aside to cool for 15 minutes, then refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Meanwhile, cut cheeks from mangoes. Scoop flesh into a blender. Trim remaining flesh from around the stones and add to blender. Add lime rind and juice and 1 cup coconut syrup. Blend until smooth. Add remaining syrup and blend until combined. Pour mixture into a 22 x 12cm loaf pan. Cover with plastic wrap and freeze overnight.
To serve, scoop mango sorbet into glasses. Top with chilled prosecco.
